name: Cropper.js
body:
### What is cropper.js

Cropper.js is a nice and simple bootstrap modal  image cropper.

### How to use ?
Just add the index.html content into your wanted page and use the cropTobase64() function .This will retrive you a base64 data that you could send by POST and convert to binary easyli.


### Authors and Contributors
Tiago Soares - CFPTI

### Support or Contact

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
